long_description: The girls' Roxy Loola snow goggles boast high-end features in a grom-sized design, ensuring she enjoys clear vision as she hones her slope-shredding skills throughout the season. Amber-tinted lens has a 51% visible light transmission to perform best in cloudy or snowy conditions; lens is also shatter resistant and boasts an antifog treatment. Double-layer lens helps reduce fogging by creating a thermal barrier between the cold outside air and warm, moist air around your face. Cylindrical lens helps minimize distortion to ensure a clear, wide field of vision. Resilient, flexible polyurethane frame is backed with ergonomically shaped foam for comfort; vents in frame help circulate air around the face. Helmet compatible design; adjustable strap provides a custom fit. Roxy Loola girls' snow goggles come with a microfiber bag that can be used to clean the lens; bag also helps protect the goggles when storing or traveling.
